title: Client will NOT EVEN OPEN - PLEASE HELP
body: When starting the program, the Logo appears in the center of the screen, but the client won't open. I have made sure there was no interruption from my antivirus, and League does not even appear in the Task Manager. I have uninstalled and re-installed and the game still will not load. I fear this might be the end of my time on the Rift if this doesn't get fixed :(  {{champion:32}}

replies.body: That's most likely happening due to your OS blocking the program from thinking it's not safe. Try adjusting your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to make sure League can run the way it's supposed to and you should be good to go!

This was happening to me as well, try running as administrator or downloading the Hextech tool from riot and reinstall through that. You might also need to delete the config sub-folder in the riot games folder within your C drive and then run league from the same folder you delete the config from.
